music

Class KeySignature

  • java.lang.Object
    • music.KeySignature

  • public final class KeySignature
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class KeySignature represents a key signature for a measure.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static KeySignature DEFAULT
      The Constant DEFAULT is the default key signature (no sharps, no flats).
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Integer> key
      The key is a map representing the modifications to each key in the key signature

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiates a new key signature.

      Instantiates a new key signature.
      KeySignature(java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Integer> key)
      Instantiates a new key signature.

        Gets the int that signifies how many semitones the note is raised or lowered by in this key

      • makeKey

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Integer> makeKey(KeyType k)
        Make key.
        Parameters:
        k - A KeyType k.
        Returns:
        A Map whose key is a pitch (C, D, E, F, G, A, B), and whose value is the number of semitones it is raised or lowered by, based on the KeyType.
